text: Mpe oyo Allah akambi, asili kokambama, mpe oyo akobunga, okokoka te kozuela bango bakambi na esika naye (Allah) mpe tokosangisa bango o mokolo ya suka bilongi bisunduami, miso ya kozipama, matoyi makangami, na minoko mikolobaka te, esika na bango nde lifelo. Tango nyoso moto na yango elingi kokita, tokobakisela bango oyo ya makasi koleka
